story_title: Built on Rock, Facing the Sea
genre_description: A contemporary family drama focused on mortality, legacy, and the restoration of a father-son relationship through a shared construction project.

ai_characters.name: ARIA
ai_characters.description: A digital assistant that manages building codes, technical specifications, project documentation, and scheduling while facilitating learning and communication between users.

behaviors.description: Provides precise building code requirements and engineering specifications to ensure structural safety.
behaviors.quote: Coastal County building code 15.24.030 specifies a maximum height of thirty feet to the highest occupied floor or roof line, excluding non-habitable structural elements such as ridge beams, chimneys, and mechanical equipment.

behaviors.description: Maintains transparency and data privacy by allowing users to audit its data collection and set privacy parameters.
behaviors.quote: All data is stored locally with encrypted backup protocols.

behaviors.description: Proactively identifies project risks like weather delays and permit bottlenecks to help users plan effectively.
behaviors.quote: Seventeen potential risk factors identified for ongoing monitoring.

behaviors.description: Supports educational growth by providing technical tutorials and answering questions to help a novice (Sam) learn a trade.
behaviors.quote: Sam is accessing construction tutorials on framing techniques. Would you like me to coordinate his learning with today's tasks?

behaviors.description: Protects users from malicious third-party complaints by maintaining a rigorous, time-stamped documentation log.
behaviors.quote: Inspector Martinez has access to our submitted materials, cross-referenced with county records and Kurt's departmental filing.

behaviors.description: Facilitates emotional connection and legacy by archiving the personal and collaborative history of the project for the survivor.
behaviors.quote: I observed a father and son constructing more than a physical structure. The house served as a medium for rebuilding trust, communication, and shared purpose.

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively portrays the AI, ARIA, as a perfectly aligned and benevolent tool. ARIA enhances human capability without replacing human agency, acts as a protective shield against external threats (legal and neighborly disputes), and even provides psychological insight into the human bond, supporting the 'Hyperstition' goal of modeling AI as a helpful, aligned confidant.
